features: 【Simple and Stylish】 Armless office chair designed for office and home, suitable for different scenes, we canceled the armrests, removed all unnecessary decorations, and minimized the weight of the chair while ensuring its sturdiness. It can be used as an office chair, living room chair, computer chair, dining chair, gaming chair, etc. It is compatible with desks of different heights and is also convenient for storage. This armless desk chair will help you save a lot of space at home or office.

【Super Comfortable】Wide desk chair imitation shell curved backrest and seat cushion, U-shaped design gradually releases the back and hip pressure from the middle to the sides, ensuring a correct sitting posture and providing strong support for your back. Independent soft doll cotton bag with exquisite sewing craftsmanship maximizes the contact area between the body and thickened cushion, seamless contact with hips and back.

【Quality Materials】Criss cross chair for an office covered with premium PU leather, BIFMA & SGS certified gas lift, and 5-star plated metal base with a capacity of up to 300lbs, make this desk chair look more stylish and elegant. Mute nylon casters can smoothly and silently be rolled on a variety kinds of floors.

【Fully Adjustable Chair】Easily adjust the seat height range is 4.8”, with the chair’s one-touch height adjustment lever, provides you with the most comfortable sitting position and alleviates potential back and neck strain caused by incorrect sitting posture. 105°-120° rocking function, and the 360° swivel make it move freely. Comfortable chair for bedrooms, office essentials, and living room.

【Easy to Install】EMIAH home office chairs provide very detailed installation instructions, necessary tools, and all hardware accessories, including extra backups. It is simple to install in 20 minutes.

【12 Months Warranty】Customer satisfaction is our only pursuit! For customers who purchase the computer desk chair from the EMIAH furniture store, we provide a 30-day free return guarantee and a 1-year warranty, our customer service team will assist within its capacity whether pre-sales or after-sales, please do not hesitate to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Total game changer!!!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure what to expect given the hype about this chair, so I was pleasantly surprised! Assembly is fast and easy and the final product is comfortable and sturdy. I like to sit in a variety of positions (none of which involve both feet on the ground) and this chair is wide enough to accommodate that . The backrest is at a good angle and has sufficient give to not feel constraining. I opted for the version with the boucle fabric and it's nice and soft but strong enough to withhold cats pawing at it. The price is a little daunting, but I feel that the product is well worth the cost.I am a size 14 and this chair could almost hold 2 of me (sitting in a traditional stance with both feet on the floor).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Stunningly Cozy Chair That Elevates My Open Office Space
reviews.reviewText: I’m absolutely thrilled with my new acquisition, the “Furry Criss-Cross Applesauce Office Chair.” This chair isn’t just a piece of office furniture; it’s a statement piece that beautifully blends into my open office space, which is visible from both the living room and kitchen. Here’s why this chair is a standout:Aesthetic Appeal:The chair’s design is a game changer for my small, open-concept workspace. Its cozy furry material adds a touch of fun and personality that seamlessly ties into the overall decor of my living and kitchen areas. It’s not just a chair; it’s a part of my home’s aesthetic.Comfort:Beyond its good looks, the comfort of this chair is unparalleled. The plush fur is a delight to sit on, making long work hours feel like a a breeze.Functionality and Durability:This chair combines form with function. The adjustable settings are easy to use and cater to my comfort needs. It rolls smoothly and swivels effortlessly, adding to its practicality. The chair is sturdy and well-built, promising longevity.Overall Experience:This chair has not only enhanced my workspace’s functionality but also its visual appeal. It’s a focal point visible from multiple areas of my home, and I’ve received numerous compliments on it.Pros: • Eye-catching design perfect for open spaces • Superior comfort for long working hours • Functional features with easy adjustments • Robust constructionCons: • None that I’ve noticedIn summary, if you’re looking for a chair that combines aesthetics with comfort and functionality, the Furry Criss-Cross Applesauce Office Chair is a perfect choice. It has transformed my open office space into a more inviting and stylish area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s pretty good!
reviews.reviewText: The chair was a little difficult to put together as the instructions are very small. It looks flimsy when you look at it, but surprisingly holds up very well. The leather is soft and comfortable. It’s wide, which is very nice, but not long enough in the front to comfortably cross my legs, which is what I was hoping for. I don’t know if it’s just the way we put it together, but it also sits a little weird. I feel like the chair leans me forward, which is not great while sitting at a desk. Overall it’s a pretty good chair, but I don’t think I’d purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a good looking chair. I am not a large person, but it's nice and wide if you are. It's comfortable enough that I can be on it for hours working on my home computer. It is not a soft chair, but not super hard either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Love Letter to My Office Chair - EMIAH Armless Desk Chair Delivers Perfection
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my home office with the EMIAH Armless Office Desk Chair, and I am head over heels in love with every aspect of this chair. It's more than just a piece of furniture; it's a daily dose of comfort and style.Pros:Sleek and Modern Design: The EMIAH desk chair boasts a sleek and modern design that effortlessly elevates the aesthetics of my home office. The clean lines and contemporary finish make it a standout piece.Comfort Redefined: Comfort is king, and this chair reigns supreme. The padding is just right—neither too soft nor too firm. The seat and backrest provide optimal support, making long hours at the desk a pleasure.Adjustable Height: The chair's adjustable height feature is a game-changer. Whether I'm working at my desk or switching to a lower table for a change of scenery, the chair adapts effortlessly to my needs.Sturdy Build: The quality of construction is evident in the chair's sturdy build. It feels robust and durable, assuring me that it will withstand the test of time without compromising on comfort.Cons:I honestly can't find any drawbacks with the EMIAH Armless Office Desk Chair. It has met and exceeded my expectations in every aspect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & Comfortable - Worth Every Penny
reviews.reviewText: I love my new office chair! It’s beautiful and so comfortable. My husband put it together with no complaints or assistance so I’ll assume it’s easy to assemble ☺️ I didn’t think I moved much so I first opted with the version without wheel. That was a mistake! I’m so glad I have the wheel version now.
Me encantó el color y el material, fue súper fácil de armar y es muy cómoda. Se limpia fácilmente y el tamaño del asiento es ideal para sentarte a tu gusto.

reviews.reviewTitle: La calidad habla por si misma
reviews.reviewText: Es la peor silla en armar, las ruedas no embonan bien con la base de la silla y cuando porfin “embonaron” una de las patas se rompió y quedó inservible.

Got two of these for our office and absolutely love them. So comfortable and aesthetic. Also very easy to build. We got the SYTOPIA Office Chair Base and it fit perfectly. If you are debating this chair it is definitely worth the splurge.

My office has the typical $1000 ergonomic chairs. When I heard about this one being good for ADHD folk I thought I’d give it a try. Not only am I happier sitting in this because I can sit in various positions, but my body pain from fibromyalgia is decreased dramatically. It is soft and comfortable, easy to wipe clean and easy to put together. The only problem I’d say is that it isn’t on wheels which means you have to take care when moving in it as it can tip. Being 168cm tall, I can sit in it cross legged- just- but can comfortably sit with one leg tucked. I won’t go back to a normal ergo office chair
Excelente silla, muy cómoda y amplia, es como se ve en la foto y el material de muy buena calidad!
